alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A line thunderstorms southwest of American Falls Reservoir will lift slowly northeast through the reservoir through 530 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms 8 miles northwest of Neeley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph, moderate rain, and occasional lighting. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... American Falls, Neeley, Lake Walcott, western American Falls Reservoir and Aberdeen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If recreating on American Falls Reservoir, now would be a good time to move to shore.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain
